summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to the Seattle Trade Center by Ordinance 107724 to construct, maintain & operate a pedestrian skybridge over and across Elliot Ave., between Vine and Cedar Streets, by renewing the permit for a ten (10) year period; by establishing the annual fee for the first five (5) years of the renewal period; by amending Section 7 thereof to increase the amount of the surety bond; and providing for acceptance of the conditions.
